settings.title: bundle
settings.heading: Give joy
settings.lead_paragraph:
Buy one Ear (stick) and we’ll gift you another.

Melt away, together. With beautifully authentic sound. Feather-light wireless earbuds, powered by a 12.6 mm custom driver. With Bass Lock technology. Full of charm. 

Say it with Nothing this Valentine’s Day. 

Limited quantities available. 

Daily drops start at 16:00 every day until 10 February 2023.
settings.sold_out_text: Limited drops of free Ear (stick) have ended for today. Next drop will start at 16:00 tomorrow. Until then, we’re gifting Ear (stick) with every purchase of Phone (1). Learn more here.

settings.question: I live in a country where I am unable to purchase directly from nothing.tech. Why can't I enjoy the offer?
settings.answer: Currently, the bundle offer  is only available on nothing.tech. We are encouraging our partners to offer the same but it’s at their discretion. We recommend you check your local retailers for additional promotions. Apologies for the inconvenience.

settings.question: Which countries are participating in the offer?
settings.answer: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom.

settings.question: Will both Ear (stick) arrive at the same time?
I did not get a confirmation of my order. What do I do now?
How do returns work?
settings.answer: If you are unsatisfied with your purchase, you will need to return both Ear (stick) together. This is still the case if you want to keep one of the items. In this situation, you will need to repurchase the item separately.
